title: Japanese Highland Retreat Overlooking Mount Bandai with Onsen Spa & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Mercure Urabandai Resort & Spa sits atop a scenic plateau overlooking the magnificent Mount Bandai. The authentic onsen spa is the resort's crowning glory, where guests can unwind while soaking in the therapeutic waters of natural hot spring baths. Locavore restaurant celebrates the region's culinary heritage, with skilled chefs crafting local specialties and international dishes.

Just a five-minute drive from the mesmerising Goshiki-numa, a collection of blue-green ponds in the Bandai-Asahi National Park, this resort is an ideal base for year-round adventure. Summer visitors can explore hiking trails and fishing spots, while winter transforms the region into a snowy playground for skiing and snowboarding enthusiasts.
